Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Welcome to the Pathway Program!

You are about to begin a journey that will provide a pathway to education and deepen your relationship with the Savior. To get started, complete the items in the list below, and familiarize yourself with the resources on the right-hand side of this page.

Getting started is as easy as 1, 2, 3.

  1. Create your BYU-Idaho Username and password. Your BYU-Idaho Username and password is required to access the registration system, financial information, and your online classroom. For more help setting up your Username and password contact the Online Support Center.
  2. Register for GS120L Pathway Life Skills after November 23. In the registration system, each section of GS120L includes a Pathway site name in blue. Be sure to choose the correct section for your site. For detailed registration instructions, visit How to Register for an Online Class. NOTE: you must wait at least one hour after you create your BYU-Idaho Username and password before you can use the registration system.
  3. Register for Institute. Visit the Pathway location page for site-specific registration information.

Need help?

Contact the Online Support Center at (866) 672-2984 or email at onlinelearning@byui.edu.
